                               3.1 FIRST STAGE
-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-+-=-

   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     3.1.1  FIRST STAGE, WAVES 1 & 2 - 4x2 PUZZLES
   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

---------------
4x2 Puzzle 0011                                                  Rotations: 5/5
---------------                                                       Brilliant

2  [_][_][_][*]     R1. Capture 2a, mark row b.
1  [X][X][_][_]     R2. Wait.
                    R3. Capture 2b, mark row d.
    a  b  c  d      R4. Wait.
                    R5. Capture 2d, bomb.

---------------
4x2 Puzzle 0110                                                  Rotations: 4/4
---------------                                                       Brilliant

2  [X][_][_][X]     R1. Capture 1b.
1  [X][_][_][X]     R2. Capture 2b.
                    R3. Capture 1c.
    a  b  c  d      R4. Capture 2c.

---------------
4x2 Puzzle 0111                                                  Rotations: 3/3
---------------                                                       Brilliant

2  [_][_][*][_]     R1. Capture 2c, bomb, mark row a.
1  [X][_][_][_]     R2. Wait.
                    R3. Capture 2a.
    a  b  c  d

--------------------

--------------------                                                  Brilliant

1  [X][_][_][*]     R2. Capture 1b.

    a  b  c  d

---------------                                                       Brilliant

                    R3. Bomb.
    a  b  c  d

---------------                                                       Brilliant

     3.3.1 THIRD STAGE, WAVE 1 - 5x4 PUZZLES
   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

----------------------
5X4 Puzzle 00001-02202                                           Rotations: 7/8
----------------------                                            True Genius!!
